runs.comm: full ball angling across the left-hander, Gilchrist uses the width on offer, frees his arms and lofts the ball over backward point, Australia are away in style
good length delivery on off stump, Gilchrist punches it firmly off the back foot to Afridi at cover and runs a quick single
good length delivery bounces sharply and angles across the left-hander, Hayden shoulders arms
Hayden steps down the track and drives a full-length delivery powerfully towards mid-off
on a good length around the off stump, Gilchrist tries to drive through cover but mis-hits it towards mid-off
just over mid-on's head, Gilchrist tried to pull a ball that wasn't short at all, he gets   beaten by the extra bounce but manages to clear mid-on
full ball angling into Hayden's middle stump, that swung into the left-hander, Hayden comes forward and defends
excellent length, in the blockhole on off stump, Hayden steps forward and digs it out

caught at midwicket! Hayden tries to smash the ball through the leg side, Tanvir bowls a full delivery on middle stump, Hayden connects with the bottom of his bat and Younis Khan dives forward at midwicket to take the catch
pitches on off stump and angles sharply away from Ponting who lunges forward and lets the ball go through to Akmal
Tanvir strays on to leg stump, Ponting gets off the mark by moving across his stumps and flicking to fine leg
Tanvir strays on to Gilchrist's pads this time, Gilchrist moves towards the off side and glances the ball past the fielder at short fine leg
full ball swings into Ponting's middle and leg stump, Ponting moves across his stumps and gets hit on the pad, he was trying to flick that one but got beaten by the movement off the pitch into him
full delivery outside the off stump, Gilchrist tries to drive straight down the ground but mis-times it
short and wide outside off stump, that's Gilchrist's favourite area, he moves on to the back foot and cuts hard through covers for four
Gilchrist tries to hammer a wide delivery through the off side but the ball was too wide to make contact
Asif gives Gilchrist more room outside of stump, Gilchrist stands in his crease, frees his arms, and lofts the ball over cover for another boundary, he's looking dangerous now

Asif over-compensates by bowling a full ball on leg stump, Gilchrist clips the ball off his pads and he's timed it beautifully, the fielder tries to stop it with his boot on the boundary rope but the ball beats him
Asif strays down leg side this time, another wide
Asif bowls a yorker on middle stump, Gilchrist digs it out towards mid-on for  a single to keep strike
Tanvir strays down leg side this time, Pakistan are generous with the wides today
Tanvir pitches on middle and angles the ball into Gilchrist who tucks it off his hips towards short fine leg
Ponting steps forward to a full ball on middle stump and drives back to Tanvir
short and wide outside off stump, Ponting waits on the back foot and tries to cut over point, he gets a top edge to Asif at third man
caught at point! Gilchrist tries to hit a full ball from off stump down the ground, he gets an outside edge which lobs up towards Hafeez at point who takes a simple catch
pushed off the pads to midwicket for a single
cut off the back foot past point for a single
beaten, Asif pitches the ball on a good length on off stump, Symonds gets caught on the crease and fends at it, the ball speeds past the outside edge
Symonds tries to hit the ball down the ground but the ball angles into him and strikes him on the pad, there's a loud appeal for lbw but it was too high
cut off the front foot towards third man for one more
good length delivery outside off stump, Symonds waits on the back foot and cuts to third man
short of a length delivery angling into the right-hander's middle stump, Ponting pushes the ball towards mid-on for a single
what power! Symonds backs away towards leg to make room and smashes a length delivery with a flat bat over cover, the ball bounces just once before going over the boundary line
Tanvir strays on to Ponting's leg and middle stump, Ponting drives between midwicket and mid-on for another boundary
Ponting bottom edges an attempted drive on the off side and calls for the single, both batsmen hesitate but they make it safely in the end
Symonds frees his arms and tries to smash Tanvir down the ground but gets beaten by a slower delivery outside off stump
Tanvir bowls a slow full toss which Symonds lofts over mid-on for another boundary
too short and too wide outside off stump, Symonds gets on to the front foot and smashes it flat over cover's head, he's on a roll
driven hard through covers once again, Symonds' is striking the ball splendidly, Misbah dives on the deep cover boundary to save four
driven back to the bowler off the front foot
dropped slightly short outside off stump, Symonds waits on the back foot and threads the cut between backward point and short third man
cut off the back foot through point for a single
Ponting tries to pull a ball that pitches on middle stump and spins across him, he gets a bottom edge which goes between Akmal's legs for a boundary
Ponting cuts off the back foot to point
Ponting waits in his crease and opens the face of the bat very late to run the ball past short third man for four more, expensive start from Afridi
Symonds moves quickly towards the leg side and uses the room to drive powerfully through covers, it's raining fours at the Wanderers and we haven't had a single six
driven off the front foot to cover
pushed towards cover for a single
bowled flat on middle stump, Ponting leans forward and drives to midwicket
dropped, Symonds hammers the ball straight back at Hafeez who can't hold on to the catch, that was struck very hard
played off the pads through square leg
Ponting tries to run the ball down to third man but gets beaten outside off stump
he tries to cut this time but is beaten once again

Ponting tries to sweep Afridi but misses the ball, he over balances and lifts his back foot outside the crease, Akmal whips off the bails but Ponting had just managed to get a fraction of his boot behind the line
Ponting comes down the pitch, Afridi beats him with a quicker ball but Akmal misses a stumping chance
bowled him! Symonds backs away, moves his front foot out of the way and tries to slog sweep, Afridi bowls a quicker ball, beats Symonds completely, and hits middle stump
Hussey pulls a quick ball to midwicket, Afridi completes a maiden wicket
Ponting pulls through midwicket for a single
Hussey tries to pull Hafeez off the back foot but gets beaten, the ball wasn't short enough
played off the pads through square leg for  a single
Ponting comes forward and drives through midwicket for  one more
bowled full on middle stump, Hussey pushes the ball towards midwicket
tossed up on off stump, Ponting gets on to the front foot and drives towards cover
bowled slower through the air on middle stump, Ponting steps forward and drives to long-on
played with an open face in front of Hafeez at point
bowled full outside the off stump, Hussey leans forward and drives to cover for one
Ponting lunges forward but has to wait for the slower ball to come to him, played towards cover point
reverse-swept to short third man
flighted delivery on off stump, Ponting nudges it behind point for  a single
bowled! Ponting gets down on one knee and tries to pull Hafeez through midwicket, he misses the ball completely and Hafeez hits off stump, huge wicket for Pakistan
driven off the front foot to long-on for  a single, Hodge is off the mark straightaway
full ball angling into the left-hander, driven to long-off on the front foot
played off the pads through square leg for one more
Hussey steps down the track, Hafeez sees him coming and bowls a quicker ball, Hussey defends back to the bowler
full ball on middle stump, Hussey comes forward and drives off his toes through midwicket, he's placed that extremely well and the ball speeds to the boundary, that's the first four for 29 balls
good length delivery on off stump angles into Hodge who tries to play the ball behind square but gets hit on the pad
excellent ball, Gul pitches on off stump, drawing Hodge into the front foot drive, the ball leaves the right-hander off the pitch and bounces sharply through to Akmal
driven off the front foot through covers, that single brings up Australia's 100
driven towards midwicket off the front foot
Hussey drives off the front foot to Afridi at cover, Hussey calls for a risky single, Afridi shies at the non-striker's end but misses
Gul ends the over with a yorker that strikes Hodge on the boot after he misses the flick
Hafeez bowls a short one on middle stump, Hussey pulls off the back foot to deep midwicket
flicked off the pads to deep backward square leg
too short from Hafeez, Hodge waits on the back foot and pulls over the fielder in the circle at midwicket, he's placed that well between long-on and deep midwicket
Hodge pushes the ball off his pads through midwicket, they run a comfortable single but decide to go for the risky second run, Nazir hits the stumps direct at the batsman's end but Hodge is home
played with an open face to short third man
Hussey moves on to the back foot and guides the ball towards backward point

Hussey charges down the track and drives a full toss back at Gul who gets a hand to it, the shot was so well timed that it runs towards the long-on boundary where Tanvir stops it with his boot just inside the rope
Gul fires the yorker in on middle stump, pushed towards cover for  a single
short of a length on leg and middle stump, nudged off the pads towards midwicket for one more
full ball on off and middle stump, Hodge gets his front foot out of the way and drives to long-on
too full and too straight from Gul, Hodge frees his arms and swings his bat hard to send the ball over midwicket for another boundary
that was extremely quick and in the blockhole outside off stump, Hodge tried to run it down to third man but was beaten for pace
tossed up on leg stump, Hussey leans forward and clips it off his pads behind square
that's the first six of the innings! Hussey steps down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball, and lofts Afridi cleanly back over his head
bowled flatter and quicker on off stump, Hussey waits on the back foot and plays the ball to short third man
pushed towards cover off the front foot
Hussey tries to play the ball towards midwicket but gets a leading edge towards cover

short and wide outside off stump, Hodge reaches out for it and hits the ball through cover, Hafeez runs to his right on the cover boundary and dives, he gets a hand to it but the ball reaches the boundary
Hussey takes a step down the track and flicks a low full toss crisply through midwicket for four more, that was superbly timed and placed, these two have added 50 off only 30 balls
Hussey charges down the track, Gul sees him coming and bowls a short ball, Hussey makes room and cuts over point, excellent improvisation
he steps down the track once again and drives a full toss towards deep cover
Gul bowls a yorker on middle and leg stump, Hodge backs away and manages to play it towards midwicket for a single
once again Hussey walks down the pitch, he tries to drive straight but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
Hodge steps across his stumps and flicks a full toss through midwicket for a single
he starts off with a slower ball which Hodge tries to swing through the leg side, he gets beaten by the lack of pace and gets a top edge that flies over Akmal's head and falls safe
full ball on middle stump, flicked off the pads through square leg
another slower ball on off stump, Hussey opens the face and plays the ball towards point
full ball angling into the right-hander from round the wicket, Hodge lofts the ball towards long-on
caught! Hussey steps down the pitch and tries to loft the ball over the off side, Tanvir bowls a slower one and Hussey slices the ball in Nazir at deep cover
driven off the front foot towards long-on
full delivery on off stump, Hodge comes down the track and drives to long-on
full delivery outside off stump, Hodge backs away towards leg side and tries to reach out for the ball, he's too far away from it to make contact
full toss outside off stump, hit towards Afridi at cover point for  a single

the direct hit runs out Clarke! Clarke backs away towards leg and drives firmly to Afridi at point and sets off for the single, Afridi picks up and throws down the stumps at the bowler's end with Clarke well short
Gul bowls a superb yorker which Hodge can only play back to the bowler
full ball on middle stump, Hodge flicks if off his pads to deep backward square leg
low full toss on off stump, Hodge moves his front foot out of the way and hits through midwicket
full delivery outside off stump, Lee drives off the front foot towards cover
caught at long-on! Hodge tries to loft over the straight boundary but doesn't get the necessary elevation, Younis Khan takes a well-judged catch on the boundary
Lee makes room and tries to smash one out of the ground but gets beaten outside the off stump
superb yorker on middle stump, Lee digs it out towards the off side and sets off for the single
another yorker length delivery on leg stump, Johnson flicks off his pads through square leg for a single
